paragraphs.title: IMPORT
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
import pandas as pd
import time
import numpy as np
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
from pyspark.sql.functions import monotonically_increasing_id,row_number
from pyspark.sql import Window
from pyspark.sql.types import *
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
import __builtin__ as builtins

paragraphs.title: DATA_LOAD
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
#Data Load

df_pizza_2015 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/pizza/pizza_2015.csv")
df_pizza_2016 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/pizza/pizza_2016.csv")
df_pizza_2017 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/pizza/pizza_2017.csv")
df_pizza_2018 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/pizza/pizza_2018.csv")
df_pizza_2019 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/pizza/pizza_2019.csv")



df_pizza_concat = df_pizza_2015.union(df_pizza_2016)
df_pizza_concat= df_pizza_concat.union(df_pizza_2017)
df_pizza_concat= df_pizza_concat.union(df_pizza_2018)
df_pizza_concat= df_pizza_concat.union(df_pizza_2019)

df_pizza_concat = df_pizza_concat.select(col("_c0").alias("Dates"), col("_c1").alias("Day"),col("_c2").alias("Gender"),
                  col("_c3").alias("Age"),col("_c4").alias("Si"), col("_c5").alias("Gu"),
                   col("_c6").alias("Store"),col("_c7").cast('float').alias("Order"))

df_pizza_concat = df_pizza_concat.drop("Si").drop("Store")

##

#df_chicken_2013 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/chicken/chicken_2013.csv")
df_chicken_2014 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/chicken/chicken_2014.csv")
df_chicken_2015 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/chicken/chicken_2015.csv")
df_chicken_2016 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/chicken/chicken_2016.csv")
df_chicken_2017 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/chicken/chicken_2017.csv")
df_chicken_2017=df_chicken_2017.drop("_c6")
df_chicken_2018 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/chicken/chicken_2018.csv")
df_chicken_2018=df_chicken_2018.drop("_c6")
df_chicken_2019 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/chicken/chicken_2019.csv")
df_chicken_2019=df_chicken_2019.drop("_c6")


#df_chicken_concat = df_chicken_2013.union(df_chicken_2014)
df_chicken_concat= df_chicken_2014.union(df_chicken_2015)
df_chicken_concat= df_chicken_concat.union(df_chicken_2016)
df_chicken_concat= df_chicken_concat.union(df_chicken_2017)
df_chicken_concat= df_chicken_concat.union(df_chicken_2018)
df_chicken_concat= df_chicken_concat.union(df_chicken_2019)

df_chicken_concat = df_chicken_concat.select(col("_c0").alias("Dates"), col("_c1").alias("Day"),col("_c2").alias("Gender"),
                  col("_c3").alias("Age"),col("_c4").alias("Si"), col("_c5").alias("Gu"),
                   col("_c6").alias("Store"),col("_c7").cast('float').alias("Order"))
df_chicken_concat = df_chicken_concat.drop("Si").drop("Store")


##

df_china_2013 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/china/china_2013.csv")
df_china_2014 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/china/china_2014.csv")
df_china_2015 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/china/china_2015.csv")
df_china_2016 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/china/china_2016.csv")
df_china_2017 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/china/china_2017.csv")
df_china_2017 = df_china_2017.drop("_c6")
df_china_2018 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/china/china_2018.csv")
df_china_2018 = df_china_2018.drop("_c6")
df_china_2019 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/china/china_2019.csv")
df_china_2019 = df_china_2019.drop("_c6")



df_china_concat = df_china_2013.union(df_china_2014)
df_china_concat= df_china_concat.union(df_china_2015)
df_china_concat= df_china_concat.union(df_china_2016)
df_china_concat= df_china_concat.union(df_china_2017)
df_china_concat= df_china_concat.union(df_china_2018)
df_china_concat= df_china_concat.union(df_china_2019)

df_china_concat = df_china_concat.select(col("_c0").alias("Dates"), col("_c1").alias("Day"),col("_c2").alias("Gender"),
                  col("_c3").alias("Age"),col("_c4").alias("Si"), col("_c5").alias("Gu"),
                   col("_c6").alias("Store"),col("_c7").cast('float').alias("Order"))
df_china_concat = df_china_concat.drop("Si").drop("Store")


df_people = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","true").load("data/people/preprocessed_age_gender_2019_1.csv")
df_people = df_people.select(col("지역").alias("region"), col("성별").alias("gender"),col("10대").cast('float').alias("ten"),
                  col("20대").cast('float').alias("twenty"),col("30대").cast('float').alias("thirty"), col("40대").cast('float').alias("forty"),
                   col("50대").cast('float').alias("fifty"),col("60대이상").cast('float').alias("sixty"))

#Data Load 끝

paragraphs.text: %pyspark

paragraphs.title: INPUT_JM_1
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
selected_j_gender = z.select("Gender", [(1, "남자"),
                      (2, "여자")])
                      
selected_j_age = z.select("age", [(1, "10대"),
                      (2, "20대"),
                      (3, "30대"),
                      (4, "40대"),
                      (5, "50대"),
                      (6, "60대")])
                      
z.z.angularBind("gender", selected_j_gender)
z.put("gender", selected_j_gender)

z.z.angularBind("age", selected_j_age)
z.put("age", selected_j_age)

z.z.run("20190615-174746_2000183408")

paragraphs.title: INPUT_HY_1
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

region=z.select("region", [("종로구","종로구"),
                    ("중구","중구"),
                     ("용산구","용산구"),
                      ("성동구","성동구"),
                       ("광진구","광진구"),
                        ("동대문구","동대문구"),
                         ("중랑구","중랑구"),
                          ("성북구","성북구"),
                           ("강북구","강북구"),
                            ("도봉구","도봉구"),
                             ("노원구","노원구"),
                             ("은평구","은평구"),
                             ("서대문구","서대문구"),
                             ("마포구","마포구"),
                             ("양천구","양천구"),
                             ("강서구","강서구"),
                             ("구로구","구로구"),
                             ("영등포구","영등포구"),
                             ("금천구","금천구"),
                             ("동작구","동작구"),
                             ("관악구","관악구"),
                              ("서초구","서초구"),
                               ("강남구","강남구"),
                                ("송파구","송파구"),
                                 ("강동구","강동구"),])
z.put("hy_input_region",region)

store_type=z.select("store_type", [("pizza","pizza"),
                    ("chicken","chicken"),
                    ("china","chinese_food"),
                    ])
z.put("hy_input_store_type",store_type)

age=z.select("age", [("ten","10대"),
                    ("twenty","20대"),
                    ("thirty","30대"),
                    ("forty","40대"),
                    ("fifty","50대"),
                    ("sixty","60대이상"),
                    ])
z.put("hy_input_age",age)

gender=z.select("gender", [("남","남"),
                    ("여","여"),
                    ])
z.put("hy_input_gender",gender)

z.z.run("20190615-152625_1769513868")#TO_HY_2

paragraphs.title: INPUT_HY_3
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
start_date=z.textbox("start date: ex)20180101")
z.put("hy_input_start_date", start_date)

end_date=z.textbox("end date: ex)20181231")
z.put("hy_input_end_date", end_date)

show_type=z.select("Daily / Monthly", [("Daily","Daily"),
                    ("Monthly","Monthly"),
                    ])
z.put("hy_show_type",show_type)

select_start_date =z.get("hy_input_start_date")
select_end_date =z.get("hy_input_end_date")
select_show_type = z.get("hy_show_type")

#hy query 구성
start_time=time.time()

if(select_show_type=="Daily"):
    query="select * from end_df where Dates>="+select_start_date+" and Dates<="+select_end_date

else:
    query = "SELECT SUBSTRING(Dates,1,6) AS Dates, AVG(Other_Order) AS Other_Order, AVG(Order) AS Order FROM end_df WHERE Dates>=" +select_start_date+" and Dates<="+select_end_date+" GROUP BY SUBSTRING(Dates,1,6)"


hy_result=sqlContext.sql(query)
hy_result.registerTempTable("hy_result")


#hy query 구성 끝

z.z.run("20190611-003516_140102294")#TO_HY_4

paragraphs.title: POPULATION_VISUALIZATION_JM_3
REGION_COMPARISION_VISUALIZATION_HY_4
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select * from hy_result

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: HY_2
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

df_people = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","true").load("data/people/preprocessed_age_gender_2019_1.csv")
df_people = df_people.select(col("지역").alias("region"), col("성별").alias("gender"),col("10대").cast('float').alias("ten"),
                  col("20대").cast('float').alias("twenty"),col("30대").cast('float').alias("thirty"), col("40대").cast('float').alias("forty"),
                   col("50대").cast('float').alias("fifty"),col("60대이상").cast('float').alias("sixty"))
#hy end_df 구성

# 위 dynamic form에서 받은거 가져오기
age=z.get("hy_input_age")
gender = z.get("hy_input_gender")

region =z.get("hy_input_region")
store_type =z.get("hy_input_store_type")


# 이 연령대와 성별에 대해서 25개의 요소로 이루어진 컬럼 한줄이 출력되어야 함.

df_people_cp =df_people.select([c for c in df_people.columns if c in ['region','gender',age]])

df_people_cp = (df_people_cp.filter(df_people_cp.gender==gender)).sort(col(age).asc())

df_people_w_c = df_people_cp.withColumn(
    "index",
    row_number().over(Window.orderBy(monotonically_increasing_id()))-1
)
input_region_df = df_people_w_c.filter((df_people_w_c.region)==region)
input_region_index = input_region_df.select('index').collect()[0]['index'] 
#그 지역의 index 추출완료

# 해당 인덱스를 기준으로 5개의 index list 추출

if input_region_index ==0 or input_region_index ==1 :
    indexlist=[0,1,2,3,4]
elif input_region_index==23 or input_region_index==24:
    indexlist=[20,21,22,23,24]
else:
    #나머지
    indexlist=[input_region_index-2,input_region_index-1,input_region_index,input_region_index+1,input_region_index+2]

#index list를 기준으로 region list 추출해내기 
df_similar_region=df_people_w_c.filter((df_people_w_c.index) .isin(indexlist)).select('region')

#이게 최종 유사 지역 list 
similar_region_list = [(row.region) for row in df_similar_region.collect()]
age_dict={"ten":"10대","twenty":"20대","thirty":"30대","forty":"40대","fifty":"50대","sixty":"60대이상"}
age_value = age_dict[age]

if(store_type =="chicken"):
    final_df=df_chicken_concat.filter((df_chicken_concat.Gu).isin(similar_region_list) & 
                                 (df_chicken_concat.Age==age_value) &
                                 (df_chicken_concat.Gender == gender)                            
                                 )

    
elif (store_type == "pizza"):
    final_df=df_pizza_concat.filter((df_pizza_concat.Gu).isin(similar_region_list) & 
                                 (df_pizza_concat.Age==age_value) &
                                 (df_pizza_concat.Gender == gender)                            
                                 )
else:
    final_df=df_china_concat.filter((df_china_concat.Gu).isin(similar_region_list) & 
                                 (df_china_concat.Age==age_value) &
                                 (df_china_concat.Gender == gender)                            
                                 )
#이게 날짜 , 비슷한 5개지역의 주문 평균량 을 나타낸 표
avg_final_df =  final_df.groupby('Dates').agg({'Order':'mean'}).sort(col('Dates').asc())

#이게 날짜, 선택한 지역에 대한 주문량 나타낸 표 
input_region_final_df = final_df.filter(final_df.Gu==region).select([c for c in final_df.columns if c in ['Dates','Order']])
 
#이 두개 합치기 
end_df = avg_final_df.join(input_region_final_df, "Dates").select(col("Dates").alias("Dates"),col("avg(Order)").alias("Other_Order"),
col("Order").alias("Order"))

############
sqlContext.registerDataFrameAsTable(end_df,"end_df")
#hy end_df 구성 끝

z.z.run("20190611-003138_1709815433")#TO_HY_3

paragraphs.title: JM_2
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark


df_people = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","true").load("data/people/preprocessed_age_gender_2019_1.csv")
df_people = df_people.toDF('region','gender','age_10s','age_20s','age_30s','age_40s','age_50s','age_60s')
df_people = df_people.withColumn("age_10s", df_people["age_10s"].cast(IntegerType()))
df_people = df_people.withColumn("age_20s", df_people["age_20s"].cast(IntegerType()))
df_people = df_people.withColumn("age_30s", df_people["age_30s"].cast(IntegerType()))
df_people = df_people.withColumn("age_40s", df_people["age_40s"].cast(IntegerType()))
df_people = df_people.withColumn("age_50s", df_people["age_50s"].cast(IntegerType()))
df_people = df_people.withColumn("age_60s", df_people["age_60s"].cast(IntegerType()))
    
mySchema = StructType([StructField("region", StringType()), StructField("lat", FloatType()), StructField("lang", FloatType())])
region_data = [[u"강남구", 37.495478, 127.048960],
[u"강동구", 37.549561, 127.146942],
[u"강북구", 37.633931, 127.017945],
[u"강서구", 37.561020, 126.822034],
[u"관악구", 37.466396, 126.946308],
[u"광진구", 37.545036, 127.086385],
[u"구로구", 37.494802, 126.856324],
[u"금천구", 37.460524, 126.901438],
[u"노원구", 37.651740, 127.074565],
[u"도봉구", 37.668531, 127.032792],
[u"동대문구", 37.582159, 127.060172],
[u"동작구", 37.498870, 126.950902],
[u"마포구", 37.569199, 126.898254],
[u"서대문구", 37.576771, 126.939605],
[u"서초구", 37.470812, 127.028957],
[u"성동구", 37.549635, 127.041321],
[u"성북구", 37.604361, 127.028713],
[u"송파구", 37.504049, 127.116181],
[u"양천구", 37.524154, 126.855877],
[u"영등포구", 37.520961, 126.909378],
[u"용산구", 37.530580, 126.979894],
[u"은평구", 37.617228, 126.926976],
[u"종로구", 37.593150, 126.977055],
[u"중구", 37.559645, 126.995711],
[u"중랑구", 37.597080, 127.092445]]
df_latlang = spark.createDataFrame(region_data,schema=mySchema) 

if z.get("gender") == 1:
    df_gender = df_people.filter(df_people.gender == "남")
else:
    df_gender = df_people.filter(df_people.gender == "여")
    
if z.get("age") == 1:
    df_gender = df_gender.select('region', 'age_10s')
elif z.get("age") ==2:
    df_gender = df_gender.select('region', 'age_20s')
elif z.get("age") ==3:
    df_gender = df_gender.select('region', 'age_30s')
elif z.get("age") ==4:
    df_gender = df_gender.select('region', 'age_40s')
elif z.get("age") ==5:
    df_gender = df_gender.select('region', 'age_50s')
else :
    df_gender = df_gender.select('region', 'age_60s')
    
df_joined = df_gender.join(df_latlang, df_gender.region == df_latlang.region)
numpy_matrix = np.array(df_joined.collect())
z.z.angularBind("myData", numpy_matrix)
    
z.z.run("20190615-174733_1070140237")

paragraphs.title: INPUT_KS_1
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
region=z.select("region", [("종로구","종로구"),
                    ("중구","중구"),
                     ("용산구","용산구"),
                      ("성동구","성동구"),
                       ("광진구","광진구"),
                        ("동대문구","동대문구"),
                         ("중랑구","중랑구"),
                          ("성북구","성북구"),
                           ("강북구","강북구"),
                            ("도봉구","도봉구"),
                             ("노원구","노원구"),
                             ("은평구","은평구"),
                             ("서대문구","서대문구"),
                             ("마포구","마포구"),
                             ("양천구","양천구"),
                             ("강서구","강서구"),
                             ("구로구","구로구"),
                             ("영등포구","영등포구"),
                             ("금천구","금천구"),
                             ("동작구","동작구"),
                             ("관악구","관악구"),
                              ("서초구","서초구"),
                               ("강남구","강남구"),
                                ("송파구","송파구"),
                                 ("강동구","강동구"),])
z.put("ks_input_region",region)

store_type=z.select("store_type", [("pizza","pizza"),
                    ("chicken","chicken"),
                    ("china","chinese_food"),
                    ])
z.put("ks_input_store_type",store_type)

start_date=z.textbox("start date: ex)20180101")
z.put("ks_input_start_date", start_date)
end_date=z.textbox("end date: ex)20181231")
z.put("ks_input_end_date", end_date)

#ks 문자화
select_region=z.get("ks_input_region")
select_region=str(select_region.encode('utf-8'))
select_region_DF=str(select_region)
select_store_type=z.get("ks_input_store_type")
select_store_type=str(select_store_type)
select_start_date=z.get("ks_input_start_date")
select_start_date=str(select_start_date)
select_end_date=z.get("ks_input_end_date")
select_end_date=str(select_end_date)
select_by=z.get("ks_By")
select_by=str(select_by)
#ks 문자화 끝

#ks dataframe 구성
if select_store_type == "pizza":
    df_by_final = df_pizza_concat.filter((df_pizza_concat.Gu==select_region_DF) & (df_pizza_concat.Dates >=select_start_date) & (df_pizza_concat.Dates<=select_end_date ))
elif select_store_type =="chicken":
    df_by_final = df_chicken_concat.filter((df_chicken_concat.Gu==select_region_DF) & (df_chicken_concat.Dates >=select_start_date) & (df_chicken_concat.Dates<=select_end_date ))
elif select_store_type =="china":
    df_by_final = df_china_concat.filter((df_china_concat.Gu==select_region_DF) & (df_china_concat.Dates >=select_start_date) & (df_china_concat.Dates<=select_end_date ))
ks_df_by_final_day = df_by_final.groupby('Day').agg({'Order':'sum'})

def make_order(day):
    if day==u"월":
        return 0
    elif day ==u"화":
        return 1
    elif day ==u"수":
        return 2
    elif day ==u"목":
        return 3
    elif day ==u"금":
        return 4
    elif day ==u"토":
        return 5
    else:
        return 6
        

udf_make_order = udf(make_order,IntegerType())
ks_df_by_final_day=ks_df_by_final_day.withColumn('day_order',udf_make_order(ks_df_by_final_day['Day']))
ks_df_by_final_day=ks_df_by_final_day.sort('day_order').drop('day_order')

ks_df_by_final_gender = df_by_final.groupby('Gender').agg({'Order':'sum'}).sort(col('Gender').asc())
ks_df_by_final_age = df_by_final.groupby('Age').agg({'Order':'sum'}).sort(col('Age').asc())

ks_df_by_final_day.registerTempTable("ks_result_day")
ks_df_by_final_gender.registerTempTable("ks_result_gender")
ks_df_by_final_age.registerTempTable("ks_result_age")

#ks dataframe 구성 끝


z.z.run("20190615-224408_1463951148")#요일별
z.z.run("20190615-225158_1851806213")
z.z.run("20190615-225207_1668899777")
z.z.run("20190615-225958_720293929")

paragraphs.title: KEYPOINT_KS_2
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
#ks_df_by_final_day.show()
#ks_df_by_final_day.printSchema()
ks_string_day=ks_df_by_final_day.select(col('Day').alias('Day'),col('sum(Order)').alias('order'))
ks_string_day=ks_string_day.sort('order')

ks_string_day=ks_string_day.select('Day')
day_list = [(row.Day.encode('utf-8')) for row in ks_string_day.collect()]
first=str(day_list[6])
second=str(day_list[5])
third=str(day_list[4])


ks_string_gender=ks_df_by_final_gender.select(col('Gender').alias('Gender'),col('sum(Order)').alias('order'))
ks_string_gender=ks_string_gender.sort('order')

ks_string_gender=ks_string_gender.select('Gender')
gender_list = [(row.Gender.encode('utf-8')) for row in ks_string_gender.collect()]
first_gender=str(gender_list[1])
second_gender=str(gender_list[0])


ks_string_age=ks_df_by_final_age.select(col('Age').alias('Age'),col('sum(Order)').alias('order'))
ks_string_age=ks_string_age.sort('order')

ks_string_age=ks_string_age.select('Age')
age_list = [(row.Age.encode('utf-8')) for row in ks_string_age.collect()]
first_age=str(age_list[5])
second_age=str(age_list[4])
third_age=str(age_list[3])
s_tring="가장 많이 판매되는 요일은 순서대로 "+first+","+second+","+third+"입니다. "+second_gender+"자 보다 "+first_gender+"자가 더 많이 구매하며"+" 많이 구매하는 연령층은 순서대로 "+first_age+", "+second_age+", "+third_age+"입니다."
print(s_tring)

msg.data: 가장 많이 판매되는 요일은 순서대로 토,금,일입니다. 남자 보다 여자가 더 많이 구매하며 많이 구매하는 연령층은 순서대로 30대, 40대, 20대입니다.

paragraphs.title: YY_1
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

df_chicken_2019 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/chicken/chicken_2019.csv")
df_chicken_2019=df_chicken_2019.drop("_c6")
df_chicken_2019 = df_chicken_2019.select(col("_c0").alias("Dates"), col("_c1").alias("Day"),col("_c2").alias("Gender"),
                  col("_c3").alias("Age"),col("_c4").alias("Si"), col("_c5").alias("Gu"),
                   col("_c7").alias("Store"),col("_c8").cast('float').alias("Order"))
df_chicken_2019 = df_chicken_2019.drop("Si").drop("Store").drop("Day").drop("Gender").drop("Age")

df_china_2019 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/china/china_2019.csv")
df_china_2019 = df_china_2019.drop("_c6")

df_china_2019 = df_china_2019.select(col("_c0").alias("Dates"), col("_c1").alias("Day"),col("_c2").alias("Gender"),
                  col("_c3").alias("Age"),col("_c4").alias("Si"), col("_c5").alias("Gu"),
                   col("_c7").alias("Store"),col("_c8").cast('float').alias("Order"))
df_china_2019 = df_china_2019.drop("Si").drop("Store").drop("Day").drop("Gender").drop("Age")

df_pizza_2019 = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/pizza/pizza_2019.csv")
df_pizza_2019 = df_pizza_2019.select(col("_c0").alias("Dates"), col("_c1").alias("Day"),col("_c2").alias("Gender"),
                  col("_c3").alias("Age"),col("_c4").alias("Si"), col("_c5").alias("Gu"),
                   col("_c6").alias("Store"),col("_c7").cast('float').alias("Order"))

df_pizza_2019 = df_pizza_2019.drop("Si").drop("Store").drop("Day").drop("Gender").drop("Age")

####이중에서 2019_df_pizza, chicken, china 를 쓰는데 그중에서도 Dates가 3월인거만 골라서 Dataframe 만들기 
df_china_2019=df_china_2019.filter(col("Dates").substr(5,2)==("03"))
df_pizza_2019=df_pizza_2019.filter(col("Dates").substr(5,2)==("03"))
df_chicken_2019=df_chicken_2019.filter(col("Dates").substr(5,2)==("03"))

### 구별 주문량 구하기 
df_chicken_2019 =df_chicken_2019.groupby('Gu').agg({'Order':'sum'}).select(col("Gu").alias("Gu"),col("sum(Order)").alias("Order"))
df_pizza_2019 =df_pizza_2019.groupby('Gu').agg({'Order':'sum'}).select(col("Gu").alias("Gu"),col("sum(Order)").alias("Order"))
df_china_2019 =df_china_2019.groupby('Gu').agg({'Order':'sum'}).select(col("Gu").alias("Gu"),col("sum(Order)").alias("Order"))

####가게 데이터 load
df_store_region = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","false").load("data/store/store_region.csv")

df_store_region = df_store_region.select(col("_c0").alias("id"), col("_c1").alias("store_type"),col("_c2").alias("region"))

### 처음부터 업종별로 3개의 df로 나누자! 
df_china_region=df_store_region.filter(col("store_type")==("중국음식/중국집"))
df_chicken_region=df_store_region.filter(col("store_type")==("후라이드/양념치킨"))
df_pizza_region=df_store_region.filter(col("store_type")==("피자전문"))

### 구별 가게수 파악 df ! 

df_china_region =df_china_region.groupby('region').agg({'id':'count'}).select(col("region").alias("Gu"),col("count(id)").alias("Count"))
df_chicken_region =df_chicken_region.groupby('region').agg({'id':'count'}).select(col("region").alias("Gu"),col("count(id)").alias("Count"))
df_pizza_region =df_pizza_region.groupby('region').agg({'id':'count'}).select(col("region").alias("Gu"),col("count(id)").alias("Count"))


## 구별 좌표 load
df_location = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header","True").load("data/out.csv").drop("_c0")

z.z.run("20190615-220357_839122366")

paragraphs.title: YY_3
YY_4
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
def drawSeoul(targetData, blockedMap, cmapname):
    gamma = 0.75

    whitelabelmin = (builtins.max(blockedMap[targetData]) - builtins.min(blockedMap[targetData])) * 0.25 + builtins.min(blockedMap[targetData]) #with column, 
    datalabel = targetData
    
    vmin = builtins.min(blockedMap[targetData])
    vmax = builtins.max(blockedMap[targetData])
    

    HAN_Riv = [(0,2),(1,2),(1,3),(2,3),(3,3),(3,4),(4,4),(4,3),(5,3),(6,3),(6,2),(7,2)] #한강 라인
    
    mapdata = blockedMap.pivot(index='y', columns='x', values=targetData)
    masked_mapdata = np.ma.masked_where(np.isnan(mapdata), mapdata)
    
    plt.figure(figsize=(7,4))#창크
    plt.pcolor(masked_mapdata, vmin=vmin, vmax=vmax, cmap=cmapname, edgecolor='#aaaaaa', linewidth=0.5)
    
    # 지역 이름 표시
    for idx, row in blockedMap.iterrows():
        annocolor = 'black' if row[targetData] > whitelabelmin else 'white'

        dispname = row['Eng_Gu']
        # 서대문구, 서귀포시 같이 이름이 3자 이상인 경우에 작은 글자로 표시한다.
        if len(dispname) >= 3:
            fontsize, linespacing = 11, 2
        else:
            fontsize, linespacing = 12.5, 2.7
        
        plt.annotate(dispname, ((float(row['x'])-0.5), (float(row['y'])-0.5)), weight='bold', fontsize=fontsize, ha='center', va='center', color=annocolor, linespacing=linespacing)
    # 한강 경계 그린다.
        xs, ys = zip(*HAN_Riv)
        plt.plot(xs, ys, c='#00CCFF', lw=8)
        
    plt.gca().invert_yaxis()
    #plt.gca().set_aspect(1)

    plt.axis('off')

    cb = plt.colorbar(shrink=1, aspect=10)
    cb.set_label("Density")
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()
z.z.run("20190616-032619_1462180654")#TO_YY_5

drawSeoul('Density', map_final_df.toPandas(), 'Reds_r')

paragraphs.title: HY2_2
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
if ans_select_store_type=="chicken":
    ans_df = df_chicken_concat.filter((df_chicken_concat.Gu==ans_select_region)&(df_chicken_concat.Age==ans_select_age)
                                            & (df_chicken_concat.Dates>=ans_select_start_date) & (df_chicken_concat.Dates<=ans_select_end_date) & (df_chicken_concat.Gender ==ans_select_gender))
elif ans_select_store_type=="pizza":
    ans_df = df_pizza_concat.filter((df_pizza_concat.Gu==ans_select_region)&(df_pizza_concat.Age==ans_select_age)
                                            & (df_pizza_concat.Dates>=ans_select_start_date) & (df_pizza_concat.Dates<=ans_select_end_date) & (df_pizza_concat.Gender ==ans_select_gender))
else: #chinese food
    ans_df = df_china_concat.filter((df_china_concat.Gu==ans_select_region)&(df_china_concat.Age==ans_select_age)
                                            & (df_china_concat.Dates>=ans_select_start_date) & (df_china_concat.Dates<=ans_select_end_date) & (df_china_concat.Gender ==ans_select_gender))

ans_df=ans_df.groupby('Day').agg({'Order':'sum'}).select(col("Day").alias("Day"),col("sum(Order)").alias("Order"))
